website_summaries.verdict: A mechanical beam scale on the lighter side that offers great, accurate weight readings.
pros: High quality construction can take everyday use and abuse
Scale markings are easy to read
Small enough to fit in tight and cramped spaces around the home
cons: Limited to 390 pounds without additional counter weights

customer_reviews.title: it is the best we have run across and if the car in ...
customer_reviews.text: Having two floor scales that seem to generate competing and conflicting results, we decided to settle the matter with a beam scale and got this model. It seems to have done the job, producing consistent and reproducible results. For the price, it is the best we have run across and if the car in your driveway is a Chevy and not a Mercedes, you will be happy with the fit and finish of this model.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: After years of digital scales lying about my weight, I decided to go back to a classic scale. Assembly was a bit awkward, but everything needed was provided. Zeroed out of the Box. I have to step off to read, but very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: William B. Cheney, III

customer_reviews.title: Love this scale
customer_reviews.text: Zeros perfectly. Eady to assemble, but totally do it on a table. Easy to read. I've had it awhile now. Use it on low carpet. No problems. It's taken a fair amount of abuse. No wheels or height rod.
customer_reviews.author: kitteh

customer_reviews.title: HealthoMeter balance beam scales
customer_reviews.text: It was a good price ---I got it in three days,, it was packed very good, it was very easy to put together, it looks cheap because it was made in China, but it works . It's true that it hard to see the numbers standing on the scales but all you have to do is balance the scales with your weight them step off and you can see numbers very well---but everyone is not a genius like me and could figured that out.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Wayne Gifford

customer_reviews.title: glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, easy to adjust. I have always wanted a standard beam scale and I have been very pleased with my purchase. Took me about 15-20 minutes to unpack and put together, very easy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Is accurate and does not require a lot of floor space.
customer_reviews.text: Use this to reliably and accurately track our weight. Compared to a digital scale is much more repeatable and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Openh2orower

customer_reviews.title: Consistent!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Although it tells me I am heavier than I would like to be, it is consistent. My old expensive bathroom scale changed if you moved it, stood differently on it or leaned slightly forward, sometimes by 10 pounds. This doesn't do that so I am confident I will be able to see if my diet changes are working!
customer_reviews.author: WLH B&B

customer_reviews.title: Great, Accurate Home Scale
customer_reviews.text: If you are serious about monitoring your weight, you need one of these (not those ridiculous floor scales). I felt this scale presented a great value and enables me to accurately monitor my weight. We've checked it several times with free weights and the thing is deadly accurate. I keep it on a flat slate floor, always in the same spot and therefore always know my precise weight. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: iel76

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: I have alway found Balance scales more accurate and more consistent in the read out than spring loaded scales. additionally having the slide and the readout closer to eye level makes the device much easier to use. This model met all of my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Scale!
customer_reviews.text: I had a little bit of trouble putting it together, pinched my finger! But I love, love, love this scale!! I've always hated the small scales that you have to look down at to see your weight. This scale is eye level and perfect! Just like at the doctors office. As someone who is struggling with their weight, I have the scale in my room and I can easily monitor my weight on just about a daily basis if I want to. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ringy

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: We have balance issues and the normal bathroom scales won't calibrate if you are moving. This scale is more accurate and allows for some movement. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kent P. DeBruycker

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but seems a bit delicate
customer_reviews.text: I have an older model of this scale, and it feels solid and durable. The one I just got from Amazon seems to work fine, but it's made of lighter metal than the old one, and doesn't inspire the same feeling of durability as the old one. Nevertheless, I'm glad I bought it, as it's head and shoulders above spring scales that change when you get off and then on them again.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Lifelines

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: We were having problems with guests taking the small digital scale from the fitness center up to their rooms, this has definitely solved my problem! Besides that it looks good, professional quality and functions. Measurement is accurate and easy to calibrate. The guests like it and I know it won't wander away.
customer_reviews.author: Marlisa W.

customer_reviews.title: I definitely wanted to spend more on an accurate scale that wouldn't break in a year like these junk electronic scales out now
customer_reviews.text: I work at a middle school. In our nurse's office we have a 42 year old Health O Meter beam scale that is almost identical to this one. And my weight is identical on both of them. I definitely wanted to spend more on an accurate scale that wouldn't break in a year like these junk electronic scales out now. I fully expect my new Health O Meter scale to outlive me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Hanner

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and a quality product
customer_reviews.text: Wanted an accurate scale. My Taylor digital reads almost the same the Taylor will vary but as much as 2 pounds is just a matter of minutes. The Health O Meter repeats accurately
customer_reviews.author: Darrel

customer_reviews.title: Accurate scale finally!
customer_reviews.text: After having digital scales that weighed different numbers every time used, we finally bought this scale. Matches our doctors scales perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Frye

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: It was calibrated correctly right out of the box. Love it so far. Weighted scales like this are ALWAYS more accurate than digital ones, of which we have 2. Very happy with this one so far.
customer_reviews.author: Gene McGuire

customer_reviews.title: A great scale
customer_reviews.text: Great scale was well worth the price accurate and easy to use and fairly simple to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Open item?
customer_reviews.text: The item seemed to have been opened and repackaged. But it works and that’s what’s important.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia C.

customer_reviews.title: Just like in the doctor's office
customer_reviews.text: This came partially assembled but took just minutes to finish the assembly. There are no batteries so you know what it says you weigh is accurate... good or bad.... lol
customer_reviews.author: TexasPepper

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with with the overall quality.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like the marking, to difficult to read . It is used for personal wait measuring
customer_reviews.author: Ed Rush

customer_reviews.title: Health O Meter
customer_reviews.text: It is wonderful !!! I know that people think I am crazy for weighing myself daily. But by doing that I have kept my weight within the normal BMI for my height .
customer_reviews.author: MJA

customer_reviews.title: Like the one in doctor 's office
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after two digital scales broke. Hope this one will last many years. It works just like the one in doctor's office or gym. It is easy to set up and shipping came quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Winehart

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: These last forever, they are accurate and no batteries. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The scale was very easy to put together. After checking the scale with the one at my doctors I found it was accurate as well. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: bwenz

customer_reviews.title: A Good Scale
customer_reviews.text: We're very pleased with this scale. It was easy to setup, and is easy to use. It gives consistent readings when you step off and reweigh, unlike various electronic/digital scales we've had.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Miner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great price. Purchased for my husband for Christmas. Very accurate and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Nice Scale
customer_reviews.text: I like the scale ok as it does what it's meant to do and is nice and high and close to eye level. The only issue I have with it is that the numbers are so small that I have to put glasses on to read them. We had a similar scale many years ago and the numbers were much bigger and easier to read. It's well made and will probably outlive me.
customer_reviews.author: Penni KnappTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good accurate beam scale for the price
customer_reviews.text: Received the scales only days after my order. Everything was well packed and no damage. Assembled easily and seems sturdy for a home scale (not really commercially rugged, but good for home). Very pleased with weight accuracy! I can finally get a good consistent weigh in at home.
customer_reviews.author: brad flora

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This scale is very accurate, it shows every ounce I gained or lose.
customer_reviews.author: like to shop

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale for the value asked and shipped in great ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Scale for the value asked and shipped in great sturdy packaging. Would definitely recommend if you are interested in a reliable accurate scale. Jackie G.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Garlock

customer_reviews.title: Great dependable scale
customer_reviews.text: Everything met our expectations including arriving almost a week early!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tradbowhunter

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: These scales give accurate weight. Even if I don't like what is see, I know it is correct. I would recommend them to anyone who wants to know exactly how much they weigh.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Horn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, just wish it was a little easier to read. We need our glasses. Vanity!
customer_reviews.author: dan adrian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The most accurate scale owned. Fast delivery. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Braveheart

customer_reviews.title: trying to be a not so big looser
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and much more accurate than old spring scale nice to know what is really going on with my diet
customer_reviews.author: Michael Domagala

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! We love it!
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered very fast and was well packed. The scale is working fine and it was very easy to assembly. I strongly recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Ramos

customer_reviews.title: An accurate scale that you can rely on.
customer_reviews.text: I can step on the scale each day and know that it is accurate! It weighs heavier than my floor scale, but it gave me the incentive to loose those pounds, and I did.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Rundle

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: this was easy to assemble and accurate right out of the box. if you want an accurate scale do not hesitate, this is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: doodle lover

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scale. The most accurate for someone seriously watching their weight. Definitely worth the price. Delivery was quick.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great transaction, Recommended seller!
customer_reviews.text: Well packed, easy to assemble and easy to use. Easy to read the weights. very portable. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Q. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Just like the Doctor's office scale.
customer_reviews.text: One really needs a balance type scale. Less expesive spring scales do not stay accurate. This one is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: L M Pistor

customer_reviews.title: Great scale for a reasonable price..
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scale. Precisely accurate and well priced.It sets up easily and can be moved without a problem.Good buy! Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: F J KENNEDY

customer_reviews.title: A great scale
customer_reviews.text: True the letters are a little small but it's a very accurate scale and very sturdy and so much better than the digital ones. It really feels like a doctor's scale and I am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Zoe's mom

customer_reviews.title: scale
customer_reviews.text: Good, accurate item that really has helped me get a better idea of my weight.
customer_reviews.author: M. Loyson

customer_reviews.title: Not for those with weak eyes
customer_reviews.text: The scales are accurate and easy to assemble; however, the scale figures are improbably difficult to read. If you need reading glasses, you may find yourself annoyed by having to go and locate them before you can read your weight.
customer_reviews.author: I. Whatley

customer_reviews.title: Scaling back
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both need to lose weight, and felt a scale would be an additional motivator. (We haven't had a bathroom scale for years.) My husband felt this type scale would be the most accurate and we had the room for it in an upstairs bathroom. Unfortunately, it arrived with the base damaged. Since the box and packing material weren't damaged, it must have happened at the manufacturer's. Fortunately, my husband is very handy and was able to make the necessary repair. It must be working!!! (ha,ha) We've both lost a few pounds since the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Hufford

customer_reviews.title: Calibrate and no height measurement
customer_reviews.text: It is not electronic and reasonable price. it does not come with height measurement. Bought separately and it is easy enough to install. You have to calibrate it before using it.
customer_reviews.author: Pain Killer

customer_reviews.title: Disaapointing
customer_reviews.text: Fluctuates excessively while determining the correct weight; frequently, it just will not stop fluctuating! The numerals on both scales (kilos & pounds) are much to small. The earlier model was superior by far and did not exhibit any of these annoyances.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J.

customer_reviews.title: healthometer
customer_reviews.text: I question whether this machine is accurate. It says I weigh less than my digital scale which means it has me weighing even less than the doctor scales like these. Should have bought the one from goodwill for $50...it was more accurate...it was the better quality scale. Even tho this was "cheaper" I would expect that the quality standards should apply for all healthometer scales so I am disappointed but don't have the energy to send back. Lesson learned. Don't buy online. Should see/test product in person.
customer_reviews.author: aprillady

customer_reviews.title: Love 💗 it
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with these kind of scale when you went to the doctors office. I’ve gotten hate the ones you stand on. So when I found this online I was pretty excited and I don’t need anythingto tell me my weight my BMI and and probably what I watch on TV last night. It’s pretty easy to put together best if there’s two people. I had to do it on my own, little more work but still the instructions were good and didn’t take long. It It’s telling me numbers I don’t like but I am actually working on that LOL , definitely would recommended it. 👍
customer_reviews.author: C. Wild

customer_reviews.title: Price was good, and it is accurate.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, substantial scale. It is fairly large, so be sure you have a place to put it. We had to wander a bit before we decided the laundry room would work best. Center Aisle LLC was very good to work with. I had a couple questions I needed answered before I ordered, and they got back to me quickly with answers. I decided to order, and the scale was at my house the next day. No kidding, free shipping. My tip is don’t waste the $40 for expedited shipping!! I am very happy with my purchase and would recommend it and the company to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this unless you have 2020 vision
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice scale - not too expensive - easy to assemble, but you can't read the scale. They should offer this scale in pounds only - not kilos and pounds. To read your weight you have to have good light and your glasses. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Alan A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Like it, BUT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, already zeroed, simple to use. BUT, I lowered my star rating because of the very small, hard to read minor numbers. Impossible to focus on them while standing on the scale (too close, too small), even with my bifocal reading glasses. After getting weight, had to step off scale to the side to read the numbers. I may return it because of this issue. It's a shame, like it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Panza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my family
customer_reviews.text: no batteries, easy to assemble and use, weighs great. We use it every week to monitor our weight. We really like how easy it is to step up and see what we weigh without looking down. No need to worry about error reading on a digital scale any more this is exact and so simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bifesalitch

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: We were trying to lose weight and our old scale was all over the place. This was easy to assemble-it only took a couple of minutes with two of us. It measures accurately to the ounce which is amazing! Highly recommended for those watching their weight.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy again because the one I have still works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: No need to buy another one because the one I purchased on Amazon in 2012 still works perfectly. This is a well-built product and I still use mine to this day. Every now and then I have to adjust it as you would with any weight scale. Aside from normal maintenance, my scale has taken a beating with all the moves it has been through and still provides an accurate result. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Magnate

customer_reviews.title: Most accurate.
customer_reviews.text: More accurate than floor bath scales. This doctor type scale has me 5 lbs lighter than my floor scale
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Chiarello

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! No batteries........no erroneous readings.........I used specific weights to check accuracy.......PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Just good enough....not great
customer_reviews.text: Not as robust as one would expect. Numbers are a little hard to read. I don't know if there is anything better out there for the home market.
customer_reviews.author: regina

customer_reviews.title: The platform looks like textured metal
customer_reviews.text: accurate but poorly made. The platform looks like textured metal, but within weeks the cheap thin plastic cover came unglued. The paint on the metal weights slide is chipping off. Not built to last.
customer_reviews.author: ragdoll10

customer_reviews.title: It's a heavy piece and well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I have to keep an eye on my weight per my Dr. The old fashion bathroom scale just wasn't hitting the mark anymore. It's solid and heavy! I pieced it together by myself. I am a 4" 11" female and had open heart surgery 1-1/2 months ago. Directions were spot on!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria C

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of the weight swings I got from the electronic floor scales. This has given me consistent weight readings. I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Goodlad

customer_reviews.title: Nice scale
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it! I just wish he didn’t weigh on it 55 times a day 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kenyon

customer_reviews.title: Balance Beam scale
customer_reviews.text: This item took a little bit longer to arrive but once it did my husband and I were quite pleased with this product. It was easy to assemble and only took a couple of minutes to do so. As it happens my husband had just been weighed in a hour earlier at his physician's office and this scale weighed him in exactly the same. I would recommend this product to anyone searching for this type of balance scale.
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SCALE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I always used cheap mechancial or electronic scales, but everytime I went to a docter's office they would weigh me with a scale like this. Since I had a change in my health, and retired, I decided to use this scale at home. I am very happy with it because I can weigh myself and tell my docter what it says and it matches what his scale tells him!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Captain Dave

customer_reviews.title: Finally - An Accurate Scale
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale as it gives me an accurate weight. My digital scale would give me two to three different readings which I could not depend on. I would recommend this scale to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dale P.

customer_reviews.title: Always accurate!
customer_reviews.text: It’s the first time in my life I can honestly say, I love this scale.
customer_reviews.author: Deb K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Scale - Easy to Assemble & Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Just like being at the doctors, without the embarrassment !
customer_reviews.author: HannibalTop Contributor: Classical Music

customer_reviews.title: The scale isn't all metal
customer_reviews.text: I had a scale like this when I lived in NY, and wanted one for my new digs. The one I had was completely metal, and this one has a lot of plastic -- except for the essential pieces, of course. I think it was a little over-priced because of that. If you want an accurate reading for your weight, this is better than analog scales, and some of the digital scales.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: PROFESSIONAL AND ACCURATE SCALE
customer_reviews.text: I PROFESSIONAL SCALE THE ONLY ISSUE IS THAT THE SCALE IS SHOWN IN BOTH POUNDS AND METRIC WHICH MEANS THE NUMBERS ARE QUITE SMALL AND DIFFICULT TO READ WITHOUT GOOD LIGHTING AND GOOD EYESIGHT.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Van Derveer

customer_reviews.title: Best, most accurate scale you'll find
customer_reviews.text: Best, most accurate scale you'll find. We should have bought this 30 yrs ago and we wouldn't have had to replace our scales repeatedly. This one won't wear out and it tells the truth.
customer_reviews.author: jtoler

customer_reviews.title: Scale
customer_reviews.text: Great scale for accuracy. Easy to use and preferred by most healtcare professionals. Same scale as used by my doctor's office. Came well-packed and put together.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received item quickly and in excellent condition. Great Sale. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Brian Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy scale for heavy people.
customer_reviews.text: This scale works great. We use this for people who weigh in excess of 300 lbs. it is strong and steady. A professional scale that is accurate and well built.
customer_reviews.author: baseballer34

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Me on Track
customer_reviews.text: Love this scale. I trust the weigh part and know it is right. With digital scales I was never sure. Very happy I bought it. Also easy to assemble by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Lewie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love the Health O Meter balance beam scale. It meets every expectation. It arrived quickly and was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Korak

customer_reviews.title: Physician style scale
customer_reviews.text: I love how accurate it is. There are no batteries to change. It is rather tall so I've had a bit of a problem finding a spot for it.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.K.M.

customer_reviews.title: A very accurate scale to help keep track of your weight loss.
customer_reviews.text: Great scale. Far more accurate, I believe, than the spring or digital scales.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Healthometer beam scale
customer_reviews.text: The unit is simple to assemble, just tighten four nuts to secure the vertical piece to the base. No adjustment was necessary to mine, it balanced perfectly when weights were all set at zero. The scale is very sensitive and will weigh consistently within an ounce or two. Only complaint is that the numbers are small on the top (most accurate) beam and if you are an old fart like me with close vision not so good, you wil need your glasses. Overall I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: easy to assembly. works great and very accurate. a good buy. i recommend these scales. i really like them a lot
customer_reviews.author: Larry Clem

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. As far as I can see, weight is correct. Quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn K. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, quick assembly and ready to use. Great improvement over the digital scale it replaced. Can be sure weight is correct anytime you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo C

customer_reviews.title: Health-o-Meter physician's scale
customer_reviews.text: Measures my weight accurately. Was very easy to set up. The only complaint is the very small numbers. But overall, am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Twila S. Podolski

customer_reviews.title: Scaled up
customer_reviews.text: The scale works fine, but it ishard to read the small small numbers on the bar. It is fairly easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie J

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Finally an accurate scales..... got really tired of the cheap floor scales. This really matters when your on a diet.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk D. Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is suppose to do.
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted one of these but not enough room. Even though I now have a larger bathroom to put it in, it still takes up more visual space than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: HealthOMeter 4oo kl Scale
customer_reviews.text: Works well and it is accurate. Not the highest quality build but not that high a price either. The pacaking left a lot to be desired as it looked like it was handled by a bunch of gorrilas. Thank goodness it was packed in shaped styrofoam.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Cattafesta

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid the box would be too heavy, or awkward, to handle. I was afraid it would be difficult, or awkward, to set up. Wrong on both counts. There are two main pieces, the base and the pedestal. There are four nuts and a wrench. There is an instruction manual. Ta-da! Up and working. (My only problem was finding a screwdriver for adjusting the zero.) Model 400KL allows you to read weight in either pounds or kilograms, by rotating each of the two bars with the moving weights.
customer_reviews.author: HMVincent

product_meta.title: Health o Meter Professional 400KL Mechanical Beam Medical Scale Physician Balance
product_meta.description: Health o meter scales have long been the favorite of physicians, hospitals and government in the US and now are popular for home use as well. These scales are extremely accurate, easy to set up and last for years providing an excellent value. Numbers are easier to read than most other scales. Pounds readings are on the front and kilogram readings are on the back. Scales capacity can increase to 490lb by adding 100lb counterweight sold separately.
feature_bullets: Physician quality beam scale for home, office, gym, fitness centers or medical use
Easy to set up, comes with a 2 year factory warranty
Heavy duty steel lever system for increased durability and accuracy
Does Not include a height rod or wheels, with counterweights sold separately
Easy to assemble, height rod is included
With durable steel lever system and 400 pounds capacity in ¼ pounds increments
